Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.recordbook

Class RecordBook

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.recordbook.internal.GradeBookDataParser
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.recordbook.RecordBook
public class RecordBook extends GradeBookDataParser
An immutable class which contains information about student's record book, including name, university, recordBookNumber and speciality. The main purpose of this class is to evaluate information about student's academic performance (GradeBookDataParser is responsible for this) and make some general conclusions about results of his study (e.g. hasScholarshipNow(), diplomaGradePointAverage(), isRedDiplomaPossible(), GradeBookDataParser.getCurrentSemesterNumber()).

More local information about each semester grades or final grades may be recieved by SemesterGradesTable methods, whose instance is returned by respectively GradeBookDataParser.getSemesterGradesTable(int) and GradeBookDataParser.getFinalGradesTable().

See Also:

  • SemesterGradesTable

      public static RecordBook fromJson(File file) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException, IOException
      Returns an instance of RecordBook corresponding to JSON data supplied by file.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      an instance of this class
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if file contains contradictory fields
      IOException - if file can't be accessed

    • hasScholarshipNow

      public boolean hasScholarshipNow()
      Returns if a student whose academic perfomance is reflected by this record book is getting scholarship at current semester.

      Indeed, the result is true if there weren't "fail", 2 or 3 grades in the previous semester, or this semester is first.

      Returns:
      true if a student gets scholarship

    • hasIncreasedScholarshipNow

      public boolean hasIncreasedScholarshipNow()
      Returns if a student whose academic perfomance is reflected by this record book is getting increased scholarship at current semester.

      Indeed, the result is true if the only grades this student achieved previous semester were fives and passes or this semester is first.

      Returns:
      true if a student gets increased scholarship

    • diplomaGradePointAverage

      public double diplomaGradePointAverage()
      Returns the current grade point average of a diploma.
      Returns:
      current grade point average of a diploma

    • isRedDiplomaPossible

      public boolean isRedDiplomaPossible()
      Returns if a student whose academic perfomance is reflected by this record book is able to graduate with a red diploma. It means that at least 75% of final grades are fives or "passes" and all the rest are fours.
      Returns:
      true if red diploma is possible

    • toTextTable

      public void toTextTable(PrintStream writer)
      Writes a text representation of this RecordBook to a specified writer.

      A length of the subjects name is limited to 60 characters, if one is bigger then its ending will be cut.

      Parameters:
      writer - a PrintStream to write the table to
